@Forgotten_Angel The story is obviously exaggerated but only a little. I'm a bit ashamed to admit it but my first real, proper girlfriend was at 18. I  was with her for a year and a half and about half of that time she was cheating on me. I was practically told directly by friends and family that she was cheating on me but I was young and stupid so I would assume there must be some misunderstanding, oh well. Toward the end she was hooking up with my best friend since childhood, a guy I trusted 100%. When she broke up with me, she immediately started seeing him. I was angry at first but things went really bad really fast for both of them while I basically walked away clean. I've also seen guys be MUCH more clueless than I was. It happens, especially when you're young and inexperienced. This story isn't that farfetched. Just saying.

@metroid dude, no matter how you spin it the MC is the guy getting cucked (talking NTR genre in general, gotta admit this MC is almost non-existent). I mean, the genre is named after "theft", how much clear is that? that plus the fact that most doujins in the genre make sure you empathize first with the cucked guy or just straight tell the story in first person from his point of view (like in "OYAJI NO TAME NI DONDON KIREI NI NATTE IKU OSANANAJIMI" which is my fav and also the one that fucked me up mentally the most).

not saying that way of looking at the genre is wrong, what's more is kinda interesting looking at it through that lense, but it's definetly not how the genre was defined.
